name: The Unknown War
description:
2 player fighting game

story mode, more maps and main menu coming soon. (Within a week or so)

Story mode is going to be similar to Fire Boy and Water Girl.

Controls:

Left character (White Guy) :

A and D to move left and right

W to jump and S to attack

Left shift to dash

Right Character (Blue Guy):

Left and Right arrow keys to move left and right

Up arrow to jump and down arrow to attack.

Right shift to dash

NOTE: Hold down Jump key to jump higher.

Also use a browser like Brave Browser for smoothest and best experience.
